评论概述: It’s okay but not what I expected!
评论详情: I love the cherry red color. However, although I wanted it to be cropped, it’s cropped a tish too much.. you def wouldn’t wanna raise your arms up for any reason. But it’s super cute with a sports bra and high waisted leggings

I got this top for my 23 yr old daughter who thought it would be great to wear over her workout clothes. Unfortunately it’s not going to work for her. She wears cropped tops but this is way too cropped for her. She put on with high waisted pants that go above her belly button and a lot of her stomach was still showing. She does not have a long torso and the top barely hit below her bra. And it’s even shorter in the back. As soon as she lifts her arms, her entire sports bra is exposed. And it’s not that she got too small a size, as the top is very wide. So it’s very short and very wide. It also has an unfinished bottom, so it looks like someone just cut the bottom of the shirt off with scissors and never hemmed it. It’s already fraying. As far as the material goes, the front panel is thick but the rest of it is light. It’s not soft but it’s not itchy either. It’s just solid material (except for the fraying where it’s cropped). On the plus side the pale green color is very nice.
I love how this looks on but I am not sure the quality will last since it's a  much thinner sweatshirt than I expected. We will see if I am going to keep it or not but it definitely is cute.

The fit is super cropped, just know that. It is super cute on, and looks really cute layered (since it is very cropped). I like the ribbed fabric on it, and feel like it is very flattering. For reference, I am 5ft2, 180lbs and bought a large.
Comfortable. Sleeves are a little short for my liking. Perfect crop length though. After wash and wear the bottom of the top has a tendency to fray.
Purchased in multiple colors
The zipper falls weird. When unzipped, it shows a lot of cleavage and is extremely cropped as well. Its cute sometimes but I constantly adjust it to my liking and it never stays in place

Really like the sweater and the color came exactly as pictured. Just not fond of the frayed ends of the bottom, it looks like the sweater was just cut on the bottom to give it a cropped look but not finished so the fabric seems like it can become undone with a few pulls on the edges. I’ve been washing it on delicate and it’s holding up fine. Not sure how long it will last though.

I love this! I have it in 2 colors, and plan to purchase more. I love that they offer 2 shades of red- a cool & a warm tone. Great quality...next I'll order black, and the cream-ivory colors.

评论概述: Sweatshirt comfort with crisp clean look
评论详情: I loved this top at first sight, and loved it even more once I tried it on.  Looks fabulous!  The fabric has body, so the stand up collar stays up, even if you open the zipper.  The details of the inlays and textures make this unique.  There's a front sweatshirt style pocket with openings on either side.  I love how the hemline reaches perfectly to hip level.  Very flattering.  I got this in XL, and like the loose fit.  I would definitely recommend.  I think anyone could look good in this.  Makes you look crisp and clean while also feeling comfy.
this is a cute workout sweater but it runs small. its also super duper cropped. its short on me and i have the shortest torso ever
Living for this crop jacket. The material is phenomenal and the design is so unique. It is an oversized fit in a good way.

If you want it to fit like the model in the picture, definitely size up ( Unless maybe you’re very flat up top) It isn’t tight per se in the normal size but it’s probably only enough length to cover the boobs and that’s it.  Sizing aside, the fabric is perfect for the gym, lightweight yet warm, very cute and super soft.

I think this crop is fashion forward, but it isn’t as comfortable as I had hoped for thirty dollars. The material is thin and a little scratchy, and the unfinished edge looks a little cheap. The beige color was really attractive, though – just enough cool tone. Some people have commented on the sizing of sweater, but I recommend getting your normal size. I got a medium because I was afraid of it running small, but I definitely should have gone with my usual size. The arms were extra long and it lost a lot of its structure at the larger size.

评论概述: Nice top, but not like picture
评论详情: This 1/4 zip top is a good pullover for hitting the gym or as a light cover up after the beach. The material is nice but it does not look as tailored as it does in the pictures. The bottom is rough cut with frays all the way across. I like the look but it is not what is shown in the advertisement. There are not thumb holes, which would have been a nice touch too. All in all it is a decent top, but doesn't look like the picture in the ad.

I sized up because I like my sweatshirts to be loose and this still doesn’t even fully cover my boobs… I have a somewhat large chest (36DD) but definitely not huge. I’m really disappointed in this because even if it were an inch longer, it would have been SO cute

This is a very cute cropped sweatshirt. It is well made and of thick and cozy material. I absolutely love it and cant wait to wear it on colder days as it is sure to keep you warm. The only part that concerns me is that the fabric is thick and can seem a bit cheap. Its still a great value.

This jacket is super cute and looks good if you dress it sporty or nice. The material is breathable and soft. My only complaint is that the jacket itself is a little shorter than I anticipated, but this can be easily fixed by ordering a larger size.

This cropped sweatshirt is very comfortable and a good medium weight. The color is just as I expected, like a sand color. I don’t like how messy the open cutoff hem looks. I trimmed the strings, but they continue to come back. I will be trying to put a half inch hem on this sweatshirt.
It’s more like a shrug because it’s really too short to be a crop top. I got it to layer on top of tanks and tshirts, so it works for that. Very cute.

Super cute but short- definitely a belly shirt. I’ll wear it to work out but wouldn’t feel comfortable wearing it places due to it being so short. The sleeves are long enough and the quality is really nice and comfy. I love the color too.
Looks as it does in description. Comfortable and fits true to size.

I love the (true) red color of this jacket!  Perfect!  I received my size (small) and it did fit oversized but it is cropped right under the breasts.  If you want it to fit longer in the torso, order a size up!  The style and cut of this jacket are really super cute.  I haven't run it through the washer quite yet but at first look, the sweatshirt material is somewhat stiff.  I would assume on washing it will soften up.  I do love this jacket and wish I could get one in every color available!
Its cute and the material is light and comfortable, I didnt realize the cropped part is not hemmed and it frays.

This top is even more cute in person and it’s definitely a beautiful, vivid, candy, apple red, it looks exactly as it did online. I’m also very impressed with the quality of the top as it has held up wonderful in the washer and dryer. Even after washing this many times, the top has not shrunk, faded, or had any unraveling of threads. The top is definitely cropped. I am 5’1 and it stops a little bit above my belly button for reference. The material is very soft and even right out the package it wasn’t itchy at all. Also, it doesn’t wrinkle easily either. I have worked out in this but it’s also cute to just wear casually. It’s lightweight and I don’t get too hot in in, even during longer workouts. I really appreciate the fact that’s it’s not see through at all. Lastly, the zipper is strong sewn on too. This top is great quality and I definitely recommend!

I do like this zip up half sweater, it’s light, comfy and very cute. There is a zipper in the center which you can definitely zip up or zip down. I personally got a size small : I weigh 165, have a bit on the bigger size bust and I feel that it worked for me. The black sweater is light and quality is great. The length is better, since it covers under my rib cage.  You should feel it out you might like it too.

This crop pullover jacket looks exactly like its photos and looks even nicer from close. It is not super thick or warm,  I would say it is good for fall or a cold spring day. In general not super warm but still super cute!

This is a really cute workout top.  It is oversized and therefore there is plenty of room for error in the sizing, so just order your usual size.  You will be fine. I am 5'8" and wearing a small.  The fabric is a comfy, mid-weight poly/cotton blend that feels good on the skin.  And I love the raw edge on the bottom!It's a great extra layer when training or running errands, with a nice, cropped length that works well with high-waisted bottoms.

Thin fabric but will be warm with a long sleeve crop shirt it’s loose fitting but a flattering loose not lazy looking.. the color I got matches the description perfectly. It’s  cute to go out workout or lounge in. I reallyd hope the worn string design doesn’t spoil the jacket over time it’s a cute touch but the strings actually do pull apart the actual sweater it’s not just a faux worn design look. So I’d be very gentle with washing and drying this jacket.

评论概述: Cute Sweater But Very Short, Super Crop Top Style
评论详情: This sweater is very cute and has a super crop top style. I love the design, material, color and fit, but unfortunately, it’s ultra short. I wish it was just a little longer because I feel like it only covers my chest and nothing else. I can wear it with a tank top underneath and that helps but once your arms go up, you can see everything. Otherwise, it’s a great top.  The quality is great, it’s thick and has a solid feel to it. The zipper works great and the collar part looks fab. I love the pale color, it looks simple but cute. And it easily matches most outfits. It looks great with leggings and a tank top underneath. Cool look!  Size-wise, it fits true to size. I ordered one size up to get that oversized look and it’s perfect.

This is the perfect cover up for working out, it is loose and comfortable but still stylish. My favorite part is the sleeves, the heel shape makes it so cute. It is getting too hot for me to wear this right now in the desert, but would still be great for most climates that have those colder summer days/nights. Can’t wait for fall to wear this all the time.  Perfect for the  wear look. The cream color is so beautiful. The quality is great.

评论概述: So cute and such a great price!
评论详情: I love this pull over so much! The color is the perfect neutral color that goes with basically anything and is the perfect length. It isn't to cropped but isn't to long and you can dress it up or down. So happy with my purchase.

I reviewed this already; Amazon is erasing my reviews, without my knowledge or consent, violating my privacy as a user and consumer. I typically ALWAYS upload videos and pictures, however nobody likes having to reupload hundreds of pictures to hundreds of reviews being erased. Thankfully I document all my reviews, down to the original date I wrote them.  Very comfortable, true crop jacket. Soft, and has a nice stretch. Oversized, but not too big. Cream color is still rich, so it doesn't look cheap. Will warm you up, and would be great to wear during a workout or walk.

I'm obsessed with this sweatshirt and have worn it consistently since I got it. It is so soft and comfy. Light enough to wear on warmer days as well as cooler days. I will be ordering in more colors!!
Love the fit! Arms are perfect length! Love the crop top look too!! I have another brand crop top hoody & the arms are way too short, so I was scared that would be the case here, but not at all!

I love this pull over - something different than my 1743826 cropped hoodies; and thin enough for spring/early summer mornings/evenings when I don't need something super-thick, or heavy. The color is really nice - looks more expensive than it is. It's super-comfy, very cute, and can be paired with jeans for a casual, Sunday vibe or leggings for a sporty/gym vibe. This is a 10/10 from me, dog.

I love my sweater. Bright vivid red color. Thick but not too thick. Cut off crop is perfect, I was worried it would be too high for me. I love it, I kinda want to get another one in a different color!

I got the red one and I have to say it's really cute. One of the things I like about it is that the bottom, the part around my center, is really wide. When I pair it with yoga pants it really accentuates the curve of my hip which to me is just feminine and pretty. The sweater is warm without being overly so. It's comfortable and loose fitting and really just the right addition to a Fall day here in New England. I would recommend for any stylish mom or teen who's looking for a little added layer of warmth.

Love this crop sweatshirt, great to slip on in the evening when sitting around a fire or watching the sun set. Just the right amount of coverage to keep the chill off your shoulders. Perfect for work out or casual wear.

Calling this sweatshirt "cropped" is not an understatement - It sits right below the "crease"... With a cute sports bra and high waisted leggings, jeans or sweatpants, it's a great look. I love that the stand-up collar is just that, with or without zipping it up. Also, the unfinished hem is a nice design touch.
Love the oversized fit of this, great for the gym!

评论概述: The sleeves are long & it’s so cozy
评论详情: I’m a huge fan of this sweater. It’s so soft and cozy. The sleeves are nice and long and cover my hands and I love that. 10/10 quality too.
Super comfy. I have long arms and they fit my arms. Great for the gym or summer night. Material is a bit thinner than I expected but doesn’t feel too cheap. Personally I love it!

I can't wait to wear! Its comfortable. I love the color, so vibrant. I love the feel of it. I'm going to order more so I can have to wear to the gym for sure. I also want to wear it in a stylish way. I highly recommend.
Very cute crop top fits oversized but it’s no too big on the arm as long as you order your size
This is the perfect casual piece to spice up your casual look. Comfy and stylish.
The green top is short and it’s also nice looking but it’s not suitable for those who don’t want to show their belly or back.
this is inspired by a $200 Joah brown top and it is such good quality
Have been wearing this to gym since received. Lightweight & stylish for the gym. Feels like a light cotton sweatshirt. No issues with seller or shipping.
Even during a rough work out it kept me cool. I love the color and fabric. It's also very stylish.

评论概述: I want this in every color!
评论详情: I love how this fits and feels. The first day I wore it every one commented on how much they like the color, and the fit. For reference, I'm 5'2 150 pounds, and I ordered a size medium. This has a raw hem, and is very cropped so be aware it will likely hit your belly button or above.
Super short but cute. Love the design and shape and I like the placement of the zipper. Well made.

I think it's amazing and I love it. It fits nicely and looks great. I am disappointed by the unfinished bottom cut. But that's apparently my own fault for not noticing on the product photos because when you zoom in, you can clearly see it. It's too bad, though because it devalues a wonderful product.

Las reseñas decian que una muy buena sudadera etc. la realidad es que la talla es muy grande y parece que simplemente cortaste una sudadera cualquiera. No la regrese aplica a devolución. Demasiado caro para lo que recibi en total pagando el envío fueron casi $700 MXN  un robo totalmente
